subject: p11569093
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, there is no relevant change. Extensive right pleural effusion, potentially combined with some degree of pleural thickening, relatively extensive atelectatic changes in the right lung bases. The extent of the ventilated lung parenchyma on the right is small and located around the right perihilar areas. Unremarkable left heart border, moderate tortuosity of the thoracic aorta. Normal appearance of the left lung without evidence of parenchymal changes or left pleural effusion.
